questions.question: What is Demofusion Custom Node in ComfyUI?
questions.answer: The Demofusion Custom Node is a wrapper that adapts the Demofusion technique by Ruoyi Du for use in the ComfyUI environment.
questions.subject: Demofusion Custom Node

questions.question: Where can I find the original Demofusion paper and implementation?
questions.answer: The original Demofusion paper and implementation by Ruoyi Du can be found at these links: https://ruoyidu.github.io/demofusion/demofusion.html and https://github.com/PRIS-CV/DemoFusion.
questions.subject: Demofusion Custom Node

questions.question: How do I install the Demofusion Custom Node in ComfyUI?
questions.answer: To install the Demofusion Custom Node, clone the repository in the ComfyUI/custom_nodes folder and restart ComfyUI.
questions.subject: Demofusion Custom Node

questions.question: What is the minimum VRAM requirement for using the Demofusion technique?
questions.answer: The Demofusion technique requires a lot of VRAM (at least 18G).
questions.subject: Demofusion Custom Node

questions.question: Can I use local SDXL checkpoints with the Demofusion Custom Node?
questions.answer: Yes, you can now use local SDXL checkpoints with the Demofusion Custom Node.
questions.subject: Demofusion Custom Node

questions.question: What is the supported image resolution for the Demofusion Custom Node?
questions.answer: Square images with 2048x2048 and 3072x3072 pixels have been tested.
questions.subject: Demofusion Custom Node

questions.question: Which Huggingface models have been tested with the Demofusion Custom Node?
questions.answer: The tested Huggingface models are stabilityai/stable-diffusion-xl-base-1.0 and stablediffusionapi/sdxl-unstable-diffusers-y, with the first one being the model used in the original paper and implementation.
questions.subject: Demofusion Custom Node
